trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a password does not meet complexity requirements.
trans-unit.target: 當密碼不符合複雜度要求時，會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException> class.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息描述錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會初始化為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的文字。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException>執行個體以初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定的值為`message`。

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`是`null`、<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that contains the information required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含序列化新 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 所需的資訊

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，包含與新 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 關聯之序列化資料流的來源

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> class from the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的文字。

trans-unit.source: A nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和指定的巢狀例外狀況，具現化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PasswordException>執行個體以初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定的值為`message`和<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性設定的值為`innerException`。

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`是`null`、<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>會初始化為`null`。
